episodes.title: What Does It Take to Break Free from a Cult?
episodes.description:
Calvin Wayman reflects on his powerful journey of breaking free from a fundamentalist Mormon cult and choosing to live life on his own terms. 

Faced with the fear of eternal damnation, Calvin made the bold decision to trust his own experiences over external voices, even if it meant going against everything he was taught. He shares how this leap of faith led him to embrace authenticity, start his own business, and ultimately find true freedom.

episodes.title: How Does Life Change After Leaving a Cult and Finding Authenticity?
episodes.description:
Calvin shares the challenges he faced in forming new connections after leaving the cult, and how following his own curiosities and interests led to unexpected friendships and opportunities, including playing basketball with Adam Sandler. Discover how Calvin embraced authenticity and created a life filled with synchronicity and flow.

Tune in to hear this inspiring story of transformation and resilience.

episodes.title: Ep.28. From Cult Upbringing to Prosperity: Calvin Wayman's Unconventional Path to Success
episodes.description: In this episode of the Visionaries Podcast , host Jinny Oh sits down with Calvin Wayman , a remarkable individual with an extraordinary journey. From growing up in a polygamous family with 1 dad, 4 moms, and 44 siblings, Calvin embarked on a quest for self-discovery and success. He shares his experiences of leaving his day job in 2015 to pursue entrepreneurship, overcoming numerous challenges to build a successful business, and documenting his journey to inspire others. Calvin is now an author, podcaster, TEDx Speaker, and founder of multiple businesses. Join us as we delve into his unique story, exploring themes of authenticity, overcoming self-doubt, and the power of perseverance.
